thread.title: Watch the moment lightning strikes a plane
thread.title_full: Watch the moment lightning strikes a plane

title: Watch the moment lightning strikes a plane
text:
Watch the incredible moments a Delta Airlines plane is struck by lightning on a runway in Atlanta. Courtesy: Jack Perkins/ViralHog news.com.au 21 Aug 2015 Travel 
A PASSENGER has captured dramatic footage on his smartphone of the moment a Delta Airlines plane was struck by lightning. 
Jack Perkins was filming a fierce electrical storm at Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport in Atlanta, Georgia when the 737 was hit. 
His plane had been delayed due to the bad weather and he had just wanted to send his wife a video to show her why he was late, the BBC reported. Plane hit by lightning in Atlanta Picture: Jack Perkins/ViralHog Source: Supplied 
He didn’t even realised what he’d captured until he watched it back. 
There were around 111 passengers and six crew members on the flight at the time of the strike, Delta spokesman Morgan Durrant told AJC.com. 
No one was injured.
